name: Erina Tussler
description: Erina Tussler is a small humanoid with notable arm spines it can use in combat. It wears leather armor and features agility in its movements.
memorable: The ability to regenerate its arm spines and grapple creatures much larger than itself.
goals: Engage in combat using grappling tactics and ranged spine attacks.
relations: May be encountered with other humanoids or creatures that prefer agility-focused combat.
environment: Typically found in natural settings where burrowing is possible.
strengths: Good agility enhances ranged attack accuracy; ability to grapple larger foes and move while grappling.
weaknesses: Average attributes can leave it vulnerable against stronger creatures.
attacks: Uses Punching Spines in melee, dealing piercing damage, or Throws Spines that embed into targets.
most_powerful_ability: Arm Spine Regrowth allows continuous use of spines without running out.
senses: Has keen sense of smell, providing an advantage on perception checks relying on smell.
skills: Possesses a positive bonus for perception checks.
additional_information: Regenerates used spines after a long rest.
Can grapple twice its size for tactical advantage.
Grappled foes have disadvantage on escape attempts.
Injury from its spines upon contact or attacks.
Disadvantage on Strength-based attacks when spines are lodged.
test_queries: creature that grapples larger foes effectively
monster that uses spines for ranged attacks
